== HiroyukiIkezoe ==

I am a 29-driven programmer. 

I am an author of 
* <nowiki>[[http://kazehakase.sourceforge.jp/|Kazehakase]]</nowiki>, a GTK+ based web browser
* <nowiki>[[http://gsynaptics.sourceforge.jp/|GSynaptics]]</nowiki>, a setting tool for Synaptics touchpad driver
* <nowiki>[[http://tomoe.sourceforge.jp/|TOMOE (in Japanese)]]</nowiki>, libraries for On-line hand-writing recognition.

My launchpad page is https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HiroyukiIkezoe

=== My contributions to Ubuntu ===

* <nowiki>[[https://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=10124|#10124]]</nowiki> need Panasonic notebook support in acpi-support
